definitions.text: get something; come into possession of

examples: These aspects of civilization do not find expression or receive an interpretation
His movie received a good review
I got nothing but trouble for my good intentions

definitions.text: go through (mental or physical states or experiences)
express willingness to have in one's home or environs
examples: The community warmly received the refugees

definitions.text: bid welcome to; greet upon arrival

examples: My proposal met with much opposition
The lady is receiving Sunday morning

definitions.text: receive as a retribution or punishment
partake of the Holy Eucharist sacrament

examples: Her new collection of poems was not well received
